channel.title: A few questions about char files [508]
channel.description:
Well, my char files don't let me into them for some reason-- i'm usuing a 508 source/client
Pic:[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/53vi34.jpg[/img]
I tryed to edit it this way-- i also went to properts and made it open with wordpad or notepad--w/e\
Thanks in advanced

item.title: A few questions about char files [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“wrath0fgufix, post:5, topic:326176”]Really, alright i’ll tell yuo about any errors that happen…

It does not save my rights as 3-- so i cannot be staff on my own server…?[/quote]
The max is two.
To become owner, you need the replace the old owners name with yours in commands.java AND login.java

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions about char files [508]

item.title: A few questions about char files [508]
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

In some of them its some login sequence that you put your name inside the " " and it makes you owner automatically. I dont use 508s, but check for the original owners name.

1.) Find the original owners name
2.) Search all the files in the server, for the owners name
3.) Edit all the names into your name, in every file
4.) Compile your server, and check if it worked

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions about char files [508]
